016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks;
017
018import de.cuioss.tools.string.MoreStrings;
019import jakarta.faces.application.Resource;
020import jakarta.faces.application.ResourceHandler;
021import jakarta.faces.application.ViewResource;
022import jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext;
023import lombok.Getter;
024import lombok.Setter;
025
026import java.net.MalformedURLException;
027import java.net.URL;
028import java.util.HashMap;
029import java.util.Map;
030
031/**
032 * Mock Implementation ResourceHandler
033 *
034 * @author Oliver Wolff
035 */
036public class CuiMockResourceHandler extends ResourceHandler {
037
038    /**
039     *
040     */
041    public static final String DUMMY_URL = "http://dummy";
042
043    /**
044     * "libNotThere"
045     */
046    public static final String LIBRARY_NOT_THERE = "libNotThere";
047
048    /**
049     * "resNotThere"
050     */
051    public static final String RESOURCE_NOT_THERE = "resNotThere";
052
053    /**
054     * "rendererererer"
055     */
056    public static final String RENDERER_SUFFIX = "-rendererererer";
057
058    /**
059     * the availableResouces use the form libraryName + LIBRARY_RESOURCE_DELIMITER +
060     * resourceName as key
061     */
062    public static final String LIBRARY_RESOURCE_DELIMITER = "-";
063
064    /**
065     * "image/png"
066     */
067    public static final String DEFAULT_CONTENT_TYPE = "image/png";
068
069    @Setter
070    private boolean resourceRequest;
071
072    /**
073     * A map of resources to be provided by this resourceHandler.
074     */
075    @Getter
076    @Setter
077    private Map<String, CuiMockResource> availableResouces = new HashMap<>();
078
079    /**
080     * Creates an resourceIdetnifier utilized by availableResouces
081     *
082     * @param resourceName may be null
083     * @param libraryName  may be null
084     * @return the concatenated String, see {@link #LIBRARY_RESOURCE_DELIMITER}
085     */
086    public static final String createResourceMapKey(final String resourceName, final String libraryName) {
087        var resource = resourceName;
088        var library = libraryName;
089        if (MoreStrings.isEmpty(library)) {
090            library = "notThere";
091        }
092        if (MoreStrings.isEmpty(resource)) {
093            resource = "notThere";
094        }
095        return library + LIBRARY_RESOURCE_DELIMITER + resource;
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public Resource createResource(final String resourceName) {
100        return createResource(resourceName, null);
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public Resource createResource(final String resourceName, final String libraryName) {
105        return createResource(resourceName, libraryName, DEFAULT_CONTENT_TYPE);
106    }
107
108    @Override
109    public Resource createResource(final String resourceName, final String libraryName, final String contentType) {
110        return availableResouces.get(createResourceMapKey(resourceName, libraryName));
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    public ViewResource createViewResource(final FacesContext context, final String resourceName) {
115        return new ViewResource() {
116
117            @Override
118            public URL getURL() {
119                try {
120                    return new URL(DUMMY_URL + resourceName);
121                } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
122                    throw new IllegalStateException(e);
123                }
124            }
125        };
126    }
127
128    @Override
129    public boolean libraryExists(final String libraryName) {
130        return LIBRARY_NOT_THERE.equals(libraryName);
131    }
132
133    @Override
134    public void handleResourceRequest(final FacesContext context) {
135        // NOOP
136    }
137
138    @Override
139    public boolean isResourceRequest(final FacesContext context) {
140        return resourceRequest;
141    }
142
143    @Override
144    public String getRendererTypeForResourceName(final String resourceName) {
145        return resourceName + RENDERER_SUFFIX;
146    }
147}
